alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Washington (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Washington and central Jefferson Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 630 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Louisville to near Grange to near Davisboro, and moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Louisville, Davisboro, Riddleville, Grange, and Stapletons Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
